source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a high-angle, time-lapse shot of the Palais Royal - Musée du Louvre metro station in Paris. The scene captures the station's distinctive arched architecture, with white tiled walls and platforms flanking the tracks. The video shows a train departing and the blurred motion of commuters on the platforms.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a high-angle, time-lapse shot of the Palais Royal - Musée du Louvre metro station in Paris. The scene captures the station's distinctive arched architecture, with white tiled walls and platforms flanking the tracks. The video shows a train departing and the blurred motion of commuters on the platforms.

generated_critique: The caption includes descriptive details about the location and architecture ("high-angle, time-lapse shot of the Palais Royal - Musée du Louvre metro station," "distinctive arched architecture, with white tiled walls"), which should be removed to comply with the instruction to focus only on the subject's motion. The description of the motion itself is too general. The caption should be revised to chronologically describe the specific actions: a train on the left track pulls away from the platform and moves out of the frame, while a time-lapse effect shows the blurred, continuous movement of people walking along the station platforms.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: A train on the left track pulls away from the platform and moves out of the frame. As it departs, a time-lapse effect shows the blurred, continuous movement of people walking along the station platforms.
